titles.title: Fond du Lac Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Non-Intercourse Act of 2013
Fond du Lac Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Non-Intercourse Act of 2013
To allow the Fond du Lac Band of Lake Superior Chippewa in the State of Minnesota to lease or transfer certain land.
Fond du Lac Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Non-Intercourse Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee Indian and Alaska Native Affairs.
Subcommittee Indian and Alaska Native Affairs Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 113-194.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 141.

action.text: Mr. McClintock moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2650.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Senate Committee on Indian Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was passed by the House on December 3, 2013. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Fond du Lac Band of Lake Superior Chippewa in Minnesota to lease, sell, convey, warrant, or otherwise transfer all or any portion of its interest in any real property that is not held in trust by the United States for the Band's benefit.
